natural_language: Construct a 'Pentomino Fence' on a 20x20 grid. You must use ALL 12 distinct free pentominoes (F, I, L, P, N, T, U, V, W, X, Y, Z) exactly once. The pieces must be arranged to form a single closed loop (a fence) where every piece touches its neighbors edge-to-edge. The fence must enclose a single contiguous region of empty area. The goal is to maximize area, but for this decision problem, you must construct a fence that encloses an area of AT LEAST 60 unit squares.
